p: Paired-end reads were merged using FLASH 1.2.11 [ 55] and data were processed using QIIME 1.9.1 [ 56]. Quality-filtering of reads was performed using default parameters, binning OTUs and discarding chimeric sequences identified with VSEARCH 2.14.2 [ 57]. Taxonomy for representative sequences was determined by querying against the SILVA database v132 [ 58] using the BLAST method. A phylogeny was obtained by aligning representative sequences using MAFFT v7.464 [ 59] and reconstructing a phylogenetic tree using FastTree [ 60].
